page.title: 17LEISURE ACTIVITIES IN WARE
page.content: Many of the children in St.Catherines school go to clubs outside school.The most popular are Brownies,Cubs, swimming and football.Some children also go to youth groups. {Ware Swimming Club}meets every Monday at Fanshawe Pool.Ware's twin town is Wulfrath in West Germany and once year the older members of the club go there on an exchange visit.There are about 200 members altogether. {Badminton Club:}Every Wednesday I go to the Drill Hall.I go there for about an hour and a half,starting at 6.15 and finishing at 9.00.Three people teach us and there are sixteen members. {Great Amwell Scouts:}We go camping and climbing rocks about 15 metres high.We cook food on a fire and go into the woods and play.When we go to camp we chop wood for the fire.
